long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a timer. It counts down time. Work-time, life-time, me-time...

Basic features include:
- Counting down a specific amount of time and alerting you once time ran out with a popup
- Entering days, hours, minutes and seconds
- Shortcut behavior: Shift + Alt + S to open the extensions popup, Enter to start the timer
- Pausing and resuming at any given moment

Be prolific. 
Be happy.
